data.text: @TheEbonyMaw Plus you’ll get banned and have your bank account frozen facist
@Not_rly_a_bot @TheEbonyMaw And these people day Darwinism isn't real

@ReplyGuyReviews @TheEbonyMaw I’m well aware that there are some solid antiviral treatments available to be prescribed to those with early-stage covid, but that doesn’t change the fact that I’ve seen a staggering number of people reporting self-medicating with drugs sourced from veterinary stores.
@Not_rly_a_bot @TheEbonyMaw There are human doses prescribed by doctors all the time. I don't think there are as many people taking the horse doses as much as you, or the news, thinks there are.
@ReplyGuyReviews @TheEbonyMaw I don’t mean the active ingredient, I mean LITERAL horse pills with sedatives and buffers included.
@Not_rly_a_bot @TheEbonyMaw Can't tell if you're fucking around, but if you're still mucking about it as if it is ONLY for horses, look into it some more.

@TheEbonyMaw I still see people recommending using actual horse medicine and I’m at the point of just letting them be. If people don’t trust the vaccine and would rather snort equine pills, who am I to stop them having a good time?
